title: Nested Data Structures
subtitle: Complex Game Data
description:
# Nested Data Structures

## Arrays of Dictionaries

```gdscript
var party = [
    {"name": "Knight", "health": 100, "role": "tank"},
    {"name": "Mage", "health": 80, "role": "damage"},
    {"name": "Healer", "health": 90, "role": "support"}
]

for member in party:
    print(member["name"], " - ", member["role"])
```

## Dictionaries with Arrays

```gdscript
var player = {
    "name": "Hero",
    "inventory": ["sword", "potion", "key"],
    "skills": ["attack", "defend", "heal"]
}

for item in player["inventory"]:
    print("Has: ", item)
```

## Deeply Nested

```gdscript
var game_data = {
    "players": [
        {
            "name": "Player1",
            "stats": {"hp": 100, "mp": 50},
            "equipment": ["sword", "shield"]
        }
    ]
}

var player = game_data["players"][0]
print(player["name"], " HP: ", player["stats"]["hp"])
```

## Your Quest

Create a guild management system with nested data.
starterCode:
# Nested Data Structures - Guild System

# Create guild data with nested structure
var guild = {
    "name": "Dragon Slayers",
    "level": 5,
    "members": [],  # Will hold member dictionaries
    "treasury": 1000
}

# Add members with their own stats and inventory

# Display guild information

# Calculate total member power
solutionCode:
# Nested Data Structures - Guild System

# Create guild data
var guild = {
    "name": "Dragon Slayers",
    "level": 5,
    "members": [],
    "treasury": 1000
}

# Add members with nested data
guild["members"].append({
    "name": "Knight",
    "class": "Warrior",
    "stats": {"health": 100, "strength": 20, "defense": 15},
    "equipment": ["Iron Sword", "Steel Armor"]
})

guild["members"].append({
    "name": "Wizard",
    "class": "Mage",
    "stats": {"health": 80, "strength": 8, "defense": 5, "magic": 25},
    "equipment": ["Staff", "Robe"]
})

guild["members"].append({
    "name": "Ranger",
    "class": "Archer",
    "stats": {"health": 90, "strength": 12, "defense": 10},
    "equipment": ["Longbow", "Leather Armor", "Arrows"]
})

# Display guild info
print("=== Guild: ", guild["name"], " ===")
print("Level: ", guild["level"])
print("Treasury: ", guild["treasury"], "g")
print("Members: ", guild["members"].size())

print("\n=== Member Roster ===")
for member in guild["members"]:
    print("\n", member["name"], " the ", member["class"])
    print("  Health: ", member["stats"]["health"])
    print("  Strength: ", member["stats"]["strength"])
    print("  Equipment: ", member["equipment"].size(), " items")

# Calculate total strength
var total_strength = 0
for member in guild["members"]:
    total_strength += member["stats"]["strength"]
print("\nGuild Total Strength: ", total_strength)
hints: Use arrays to hold multiple items
Access nested data with multiple brackets
